values:
Name 5 things you would like to conquer in your lifetime then tag 5 friends who must do the same. 

1 Get lots and lots of friend and keep my old ones of course
2 Become a Professor, in an English University.
3 Open a horse farm.
4 Climb the Himalayas or the Grand Canyon, or maybe go across the Sahara
5 Become a member of The Camelot Research Society ( I am too ambitious)

I tag everyone, you can answer in my other live journal (cuz most people use the other one anyways)
